price: 30. Nabii Daawuuduh Suleymaan deqsita baxa necee. Nabii Suleymaan manxu meqe naqsu! Diggah usuk Yalla fan maggom gacé kinni.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lidāwūda sulaymāna niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
